DOC.brief_summary: Debates official legal implementation Do attempt resuscitation ( DNAR ) order ongoing . The aim study determinate factor influence neurological outcome discharge ratio living patient discharge hospital due DNAR prohibition .
DOC.brief_title: Influences DNAR Order Prohibition Hospital Discharged Ratios Neurological Outcomes Discharge
DOC.detailed_description: Study Design Setting : This single-center , retrospective chart review perform 180-bed rural city hospital . Methods Measurements : Study conduct retrospective chart review CPR call form complete February 2010 February 2012 . Approximately 450,000 patient annually admitted hospital ; 1800 patient hospitalized ward , 500 patient hospitalize intensive care unit study period . A form term CPR call form complete leader CPR team end call . These form file hospital archive chronological order . The hospital use resuscitation guideline American Heart Association , healthcare provider CPR team certify basic cardiac life support ( BCLS ) advance cardiovascular life support ( ACLS ) . Study Population The data collect CPR call form hospital medical record . All data note use Utstein-style reporting template include demographic data ( date birth/age gender ) , date arrest , time first CPR attempt , etiology , preexist condition , location arrest , arrest witness ( witnessed cardiac arrest one observe heard another person arrest monitor ) , initial rhythm , duration CPR attempt , end event , date discharge death neurological outcome discharge hospital . CPR attempt define attempt restore spontaneous circulation perform chest compression without ventilation . ROSC define status spontaneous circulation sustain least 20 minute . Neurological outcome discharge determined Cerebral Performance Category ( CPC ) score base last neurological examination patient discharge . CPC score 1 2 consider good neurological outcome , CPC score 3 , 4 5 consider poor neurological outcome . Data Analysis The continuous variable express mean SD . The categorical data express percentage . Chi-square test use univariate analysis categorical variable . Statistical significance define p < 0.05 . The data analyze SPSS v. 17.0 .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients experience inhospital CPR attempt due cardiac arrest 2 . Patients DNAR order 1 . Patients 18 year age 2 . Calls perform due code blue drill 3 . Missing call 4 . Patients one cardiac arrest 5 . Patients CPR attempt begin outside hospital admit emergency department . 6 . Patients miss data hospital medical record .
